channel.title: Logical CPU cores in virt-manager halved after installing kicksecure on host
channel.description: I have many VM's but the amount of logical CPU cores decreased after installing Kicksecure on host. Now I can give my VM's less CPU. After reversing the boot parameters in grub, the cores are back. But I don't want all boot parameters disabled. Which exact boot parameter is decreasing the logical CPU cores in virt-manager?
